title: My Dirty Duke
description: Violet knows that her father’s best friend, the Duke of Ravensthorpe, is the most powerful man in all of London with a reputation for sin.But nothing can stop Violet from wanting to shed her wallflower ways and fulfill her darkest, most forbidden desires…even if it means seducing a man twice her age.Note: My Dirty Duke was originally published in the Duke I'd Like to F... anthology.
author: Joanna Shupe
